## Example

**Input:** 
```yaml
nginx:
    ports:
        - '80:80'
    volumes:
        - '/var/run/docker.sock:/tmp/docker.sock:ro'
    image: nginx
```

```yaml
<!-- Paste the output of the above in here -->
```
